title: Cooking with Tahm Kench

embed.description: Introducing LoL Shorts, a new series of short clips telling little storys. Will try to upload new episodes frequently. I already have many ideas, but would love to get your ideas as well. And don't worry, of course I will keep producing the regular montages too.

body:
Hi,

habe eine kleine TK-Montage angefertigt und freue mich über Feedback. :)
